htmlBody:
Just letting you know that the form link is not working for me :) 

This seems like a very important issue and I am very happy you are looking into it!

Used my moderator powers to fix the link, should work now.

Thanks for flagging!
Thank you for the feedback! I changed the links I hope it works now. Otherwise, if you have any input you can just leave it in the comment or message me privately :)

Can you be more specific? Which disabilities? Blindness? Colour blindness? Is this like an HTML issue? What exactly needs to be changed? I'm independently working on EA communications and might possibly be able to help in some capacity.
We covered a wide range of disabilities during the meet-up. I'm now working on a report summarizing the findings and I'll share it here once it's finished :)
